com.nimsoft.nimbus
Class NimServerSession

java.lang.Object
  com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimSessionBase
      com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimSession
          com.nimsoft.nimbus.NimServerSession

public class NimServerSession
extends NimSession

This class is used for receiving requests / sending responses from / to some other party. Mark the difference between the NimServerSession and NimClientSession and that a NimClientSession may turn into a NimServerSession.
